parameters: AlainFace
\n<Alain>Phew. The resistance reduction spell from
the airship finally wore off after I made
it past that little hole in the wall.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I'm glad I'm at a relatively bigger
size now. It should be a lot smoother to
move around now.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.9);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.8);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>That said, this carpet's so expansive.
It's going to take a while to go through
this room to see what those faeries are
hiding here.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.7);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.6);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>It doesn't seem like I'm getting anywhere
at all. I think I can see something in the
distance, but I can't really make out what
it is.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.5);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.4);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>It feels like I'm being watched. And
there's mana everywhere that feels like
it's getting stronger every second.
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.35);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.3);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Wait. Doesn't that thing in the distance
look even further away now? Actually,
everything's further away now too just
like when I was Micro.
\n<????>\c[27]Ehehehe~! You were right, Big Sis! There was
someone trying to come in! And it was the 'Already
Little One' we met at Ciel's realm.\c[0]
\n<????>\c[1]He said something about resistance reduction, so I
reapplied those spells on him. Look at how much
smaller he's gotten now.\c[0]
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.1);
SpriteZoom.zoom(2, 0.6);
SpriteZoom.zoom(3, 0.6);
Fairy1_Happy
Fairy2_Happy
\nr<Celyn>\c[27]Oh wow! He's almost as small as the others, but
I haven't even used the Faeries' Blessing on him yet!
\n<Eira>\c[1]How pathetic of him. A few resistance reduction
debuff spells and he's less than a gnat. Even a faerie
toe would be the size of a building to him now.\c[0]
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Blasted! These faeries already knew I was
here?!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>And what's worse is that they redid the
resistance reduction spells so now I'm
Micro again?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Calm down, Alain. There's got to be
something I can do...
AlainFace2
\n<Alain>Like retreat!
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.3);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.2);
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.1);
\nr<Celyn>\c[27]Ahahaha! Where are you going, Itty-Bitty One?
You haven't even gotten a centimeter away yet.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Looks like you sent him back just landing on
the carpet, Celyn. Even your footstep is too much
for him to handle now.\c[0]
\nr<Celyn>\c[27]That's your fault, Big Sis. I saw you make your
resistance reduction spell even stronger. Now he's the
same size as the others!\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Isn't that the point? He should join them since
he decided to come to us willingly.\c[0]
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Others...? So the missing adventurers
really are here...
FaerieHand
AlainFace
\n<Alain>What in the-?! She held a town in
her hand?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Wait, is this a model of Niim Town? How'd
it get this small? Are faeries capable of
shrinking objects too?
\n<Eira>\c[1]Go on and head inside, Little Itty-Bitty One.
There's nowhere else to go on this carpet, is there?\c[0]
AlainFace
\n<Alain>She's right... There isn't a choice,
is there?
SpriteZoom.zoom(0, 0.6);
SpriteZoom.zoom(21, 0.6);
SpriteZoom.zoom(22, 0.6);
SpriteZoom.zoom(23, 0.6);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I can't believe it. It really is toy
model of Niim Town. Isn't this one of the
souvenirs sold in town?
AlainFace
\n<Alain>And I can see other people here.
Are those the missing adventurers?!
\n<Celyn>\c[27]Hehehe. How do you like the toy I bought,
Itty-Bitty One? I made it even smaller so it'd fit all
the other Little Ones.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]It still might be a little big for you, but
you're the partner of Ciel's chosen one, aren't you?
I'm sure you'll be able to handle living like this.\c[0]
\n<Celyn>\c[27]Hehehe. I can't wait to play with him too,
Big Sis. What should we make him do?\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Well... He probably came here for a reason, so
he must want to talk to us, right?\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]But at his level, I don't think he's worthy of
speaking to us. He's so small, he can't even meet our
toes.\c[0]
\n<Celyn>\c[27]That's true! He should be able to do
something for us if he wants us to even look at him!\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]So how about this? These models have a gate
that we can't press the switch for since we're too big.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Teeny-Tiny One, if you can open them, we'll be
willing to talk to you. In the mean time, how about we
watch you squirm and struggle to find a way to that?\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Of course, if you give up, we'll keep you in
here with the rest of the toys you collected and go
find some other toys to play with.\c[0]
\n<Celyn>\c[27]Oh, you're so nice, Big Sis! You want to give
him a chance!\c[0]
\n<Celyn>\c[27]Okay, Itty Bitty One. We'll watch from up
here. Do your best okay? You have all the time in the
world to give up!\c[0]
AlainFace
\n<Alain>This was the bad feeling I had. Those
faeries have made me their plaything again.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>But 'worthy' of talking to? What are
they, goddesses? .. .Well, I guess their
scale practically makes them ones.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>But I'm glad I let Est stay in the airship.
I'll play along with them. Once enough time
has passed, she'll definitely be able to
alert Gale to catch them in the act.
AlainFace
\n<Alain>I just need to do what they're demanding
me to do and hopefully they won't get bored
and fly off.
EMERGENCY QUEST: Escape the Faeries' Toy Town
The toy town the faeries have needs to have its gates
unlocked for Alain to speak to the faeries. Complete
both to buy enough time for help to arrive!
A
AlainFace
\n<Alain>Ngrk...! I'm... alive?
Fairy1_Smug
\n<Eira>\c[1]Sorry, Celyn, but if Bryn's going to look into
this room, we need to make sure she can't find any
traces of what we did.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Don't worry. We can always buy a new model and
catch new toys.\c[0]
\n<Adventurer>What the- She pulled her foot up?
\nr<Adventurer>What's that faerie planning? Haven't they
done enough to us?
\n<Adventurer>Oh Goddess... We're done for...
AlainFace
\n<Alain>No! Everyone! Run away!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>(Blasted... But where to? The entire
model is under her shadow...)
\n<Eira>\c[1]Oh, I suppose I should make sure there's no way
Bryn can find even a single remain of you all. Here,
I'll grant you a Faeries' Blessing of my own.\c[0]
SpriteZoom.zoom(9, 0.3);
SpriteZoom.zoom(10, 0.3);
AlainFace
\n<Alain>What in the-?! Just how high up in the
sky is her foot now? It's gone beyond even
where clouds would be!
AlainFace
\n<Alain>No way... She could've shrunken us
even further this whole time? Just how big
is she now? That foot spans kilometers
and kilometers like an entire continent.
\n<Eira>\c[1]Well, this is farewell, Insignificant Ones.
Should you survive and cling to the sole of my foot,
I'll grant you permission to live on it.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]As the new planet you'll be spending the rest
of your miniscule lives on, I wish you luck finding
food, water, and shelter in my sock fibers.\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]... Of course, that's assuming you survive this.\c[0]
EiraStomp
\n<Eira>\c[1]Oh, would you look at that? Not even a trace
of them left...\c[0]
\n<Eira>\c[1]Well, I do hope some of you lived and are on
my sock... Not that I'll ever find you...\c[0]
While ascending the mountain-sized faerie, Eira, the
shrunken Alain's size was too slow to fulfill her order
and failed her challenge.
As punishment for failing and to also hide the evidence
of their mischief from Guild Master Bryn, Eira shrank
the microscopic model town of tiny adventurers even
further.
The microscopic captives could only watch in horror as
their enormous world grew even bigger and bigger along
with their uncaring captor.
But that horror did not last long. Eira dropped her
continental-scale foot down. In an instant, the model
and the nanoscopic adventurers were wiped out of
existence between the carpet and her white sock.
But that horror did not last long. Eira dropped her
continental-scale foot down. In an instant, the model
and the nanoscopic adventurers were wiped out of
existence between the carpet and her white sock.
Without a trace, Dragon Rider Alain and the other
shrunken victims disappeared from the world, their
lives snuffed out by a small faerie's step.
